summary: A documentary focused on Stuxnet, a piece of self-replicating computer malware that the U.S. and Israel unleashed to destroy a key part of an Iranian nuclear facility, and which ultimately spread beyond its intended target.
cast: Sergey Ulasen|Eric Chien|Eugene Kaspersky|Vitaly Kamluk|Ralph Langner|Liam O'Murchu|David Sanger|Gary Samore|Rolf Mowatt-Larssen|Olli Heinonen|Emad Kiyaei|Richard Clarke|Michael Hayden|Yossi Melman|Amos Yadlin|Yuval Steinitz|Gary D. Brown|Chris Inglis|Sean McGurk|Joanne Tucker|Tadashi Mitsui|Camilo Quiroz-Vazquez|Julian Seltzer|Andy Grieve|Mahmoud Ahmadinejad|Keith Alexander|George W. Bush|Hillary Clinton|Meir Dagan|Mikhail Gorbachev|Saddam Hussein|John Kerry|Abdul Qadeer Khan|Joseph Lieberman|William Lynn|Mohammad Reza Pahlavi|Nancy Reagan|Ronald Reagan|Susan Rice|John Roberts|Alex Gibney|Raisa Maximovna Gorbacheva|Benjamin Netanyahu|Richard Nixon|Barack Obama|Michelle Obama
title: Zero Days
